text: Mowinckel (2023). ggseg.formats: Utility package ggseg-packages. R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ggseg.formats: Utility package for the ggseg-packages},   author = {Athanasia Mo Mowinckel},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

title: Utility package for the ggseg-packages
text: goal ggseg.formats provide S3 methods etc ggseg-universe. users deal package directly way.

title: Utility package for the ggseg-packages
text: recommend installing development version {ggseg.formats} ggseg r-universe. can also install development version ggseg.formats GitHub :
code: # Enable this universe options(repos = c(     ggseg = 'https://ggseg.r-universe.dev',     CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  # Install some packages install.packages('ggseg.formats') # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("ggseg/ggseg.formats")
